author: Oliver Knight
title: HyperLiquid Trader Turns $10M Profit Into $2.5M Loss as Bitcoin Falls
description: The trader also lost $12.5 million on a bitcoin long last week.
content: A trader on decentralized derivatives exchange HyperLiquid has turned an unrealized $10 million profit into a $2.5 million loss, seemingly caught by the same trap that tripped up a person using the a… [+1290 chars]
